name: Fly U Fools
description:
Some times,  when darkness is becoming too strong, a true Wizard must come to bring them the migthy light...

As one of them, your mission will be to defeat the darkness, using your magic mirrors reflexions. The light will be your only friend in this world-threatening fight.. Or will it ?

Move with AWSD or ZQSD, create light beam, or event, light dash ! Will you be able to defeat the dungeon ?

Fly, you fools !!
